text: (chaur changcha) nowpel del a l laoh ban bangheanh anak aoy kheunh puokke( sa trauv) nowknong soben robsa anak nouv chamnuon da techtuoch . brasenbae trong banaoy anak kheunh puokke mean chamnuon chraen vinh noh puok anak pitchea breachy haey puok anak pitchea meankar khvengyobl knea knong rueng noh( sangkream) . bo nde a l laoh ban thveu aoy puok anak mean sovotthephap . pitabrakd nasa trong doeng bamphot nouv avei del mean nowknong chetd
